recipes.Name: Apple Pie
recipes.Ingredients: Apples, sugar, flour, butter, eggs, cinnamon
recipes.Instructions: 1. Peel and slice the apples. 2. Prepare the crust with flour, sugar, and butter. 3. Place the apples over the crust. 4. Sprinkle with cinnamon. 5. Bake for 45 minutes.

recipes.Name: Caesar Salad
recipes.Description: Classic Caesar salad with grilled chicken and creamy dressing.
recipes.Ingredients: Romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, parmesan cheese, croutons, Caesar dressing
recipes.Instructions: 1. Chop the lettuce and place it in a bowl. 2. Add the diced grilled chicken and croutons. 3. Sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese. 4. Toss with Caesar dressing.

recipes.Name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.Description: Italian pasta dish with delicious carbonara sauce.
recipes.Ingredients: Spaghetti, pancetta or bacon, eggs, parmesan cheese, black pepper
recipes.Instructions: 1. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions. 2. Brown the pancetta or bacon in a skillet. 3. Whisk together the eggs, parmesan cheese, and black pepper. 4. Mix the cooked pasta with the pancetta and egg mixture.

recipes.Name: Vegetable Soup
recipes.Description: Comforting soup full of fresh vegetables.
recipes.Ingredients: Carrots, celery, onion, zucchini, tomatoes, leek, vegetable broth
recipes.Instructions: 1. Chop all the vegetables into small pieces. 2. Cook the vegetables in vegetable broth until tender. 3. Puree the soup if a smoother texture is desired. 4. Serve hot.

recipes.Name: Fruit Smoothie
recipes.Description: Refreshing and healthy smoothie made with fresh fruits.
recipes.Ingredients: Banana, strawberries, pineapple, plain yogurt, orange juice
recipes.Instructions: 1. Cut the fruits into small pieces. 2. Place the fruits in a blender along with yogurt and orange juice. 3. Blend until smooth and creamy. 4. Serve cold.

recipes.Name: Baked Chicken with Vegetables
recipes.Ingredients: Chicken breasts, carrots, broccoli, onion, garlic, olive oil, herbs
recipes.Instructions: 1. Cut the vegetables into large pieces. 2. Place the chicken and vegetables on a baking sheet. 3. Season with olive oil, chopped garlic, and herbs. 4. Bake for 25-30 minutes.

recipes.Name: Homemade Pizza
recipes.Description: Homemade pizza with your favorite toppings.
recipes.Ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, ham, mushrooms, olives
recipes.Instructions: 1. Roll out the pizza dough on a baking sheet. 2. Spread with tomato sauce. 3. Add toppings as desired. 4. Bake at high temperature for 12-15 minutes.

recipes.Name: Vegetarian Burger
recipes.Description: Delicious meatless burger with amazing flavors.
recipes.Ingredients: Cooked chickpeas, onion, garlic, carrot, red bell pepper, spices, burger bun, lettuce, tomato, avocado
recipes.Instructions: 1. Mash the cooked chickpeas in a food processor. 2. Sauté the onion, garlic, carrot, and red bell pepper. 3. Mix the mashed chickpeas with the sautéed vegetables and spices. 4. Form patties and cook in a skillet until golden brown on both sides. 5. Serve on a burger bun with lettuce, tomato, and avocado.

recipes.Name: Chicken Fried Rice
recipes.Ingredients: Cooked rice, chicken breasts, carrots, peas, onion, egg, soy sauce
recipes.Instructions: 1. Cook the rice according to the package instructions. 2. Sauté the vegetables

recipes.Name: Chicken Fried Rice
recipes.Ingredients: Cooked rice, chicken breasts, carrots, peas, onion, egg, soy sauce
recipes.Instructions: 1. Cook the rice according to the package instructions. 2. Sauté the vegetables
